news_header: A tragic crush at the Kumbh Mela festival in northern India has resulted in injuries and fatalities, while various global events unfold, including political turmoil in South Korea and environmental measures in Thailand.
news_text: At the Kumbh Mela festival in northern India, a crush has left several worshippers injured and at least a dozen feared dead. Meanwhile, Thai authorities have made public transport free for a week to combat air pollution. In South Korea, political unrest continues as lawmakers vote to impeach acting president Han Duck-soo, amidst calls for Yoon Suk Yeol to resign following a failed martial law attempt. Other news includes a tragic plane crash in South Korea, a contest for the elderly in Taipei, and volcanic eruptions in Flores.
